about_the_game:
In this game you have the opportunity to swing your racket to your heart's content, hit the ball with all your might, and smash the tiles on the walls to pieces. Modest but pleasant graphics in a futuristic style are waiting for you. And you will definitely like the physics of interaction between rackets and balls!

In demo version you will be able to play 3 levels with default ball and default racket.

short_description: The mix between a brick-breaking-style game and racketball. It is a game of breaking walls by hitting the ball. Utilize various power-ups, buffs, and rackets to clear the stages faster. Concentrate and keep your eyes on the ball.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Ukrainian
